meta.title: Miguel Vega - Frontend Developer
meta.description: Frontend developer specialized in web and mobile development, building personal digital experiences.

main.title: Miguel Vega
main.subtitle: Frontend Developer
description: Creating cutting-edge web and mobile experiences.
With over three years in the industry, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, TailwindCSS for the web, and Flutter for mobile.

main.title: Projects
main.subtitle: Take a look at some of the projects I've crafted.
main.description: Each project demonstrates my frontend development skills and my enthusiasm for creating sleek, user-friendly websites. Discover how I merge aesthetics with functionality to deliver standout digital experiences.
